title.narrative: Sino-German Cooperation on Climate Change – NDC Implementation

description.narrative: The overarching programme goal is to contribute significantly to full and ambitious NDC implementation in China, Germany/the European Union (EU) and beyond through strengthened Sino-German cooperation, and exchange of experience. More specifically, by the end of the project in 2025 Sino-German Cooperation on Climate Change shall have been contributing to enhanced implementation of climate policies and measures in China’s 14th FYP, hence supporting the first five-year phase towards the achievement of the Chinese NDC targets before 2030 as well as contribute to planning of 15th FYP and 2025 NDC update, through activities in the following areas: 1) National level governance of NDC implementation 2) Mitigation in selected provinces and cities 3) Cooperate on sectoral best practice 4) Adaptation 5) Climate legislation 6) Climate finance and investment.
